name: Bay Area Entrepreneur Center
description: Free business management guidance, technical assistance, networking, one-on-one consulting, and business workshops for aspiring and current entrepreneurs
fullDescription: The Bay Area Entrepreneur Center at Skyline College provides free resources and support for aspiring and current entrepreneurs in San Mateo County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free business management guidance
- One-on-one consulting with business advisors
- Business workshops and training
- Networking events
- Technical assistance for startups
- Help with business plans
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the Bay Area Entrepreneur Center website
2. Browse available workshops and events
3. Schedule a one-on-one consultation
4. Attend workshops and networking events
5. Access ongoing support as your business grows
address: 3300 College Drive, Building 1, San Bruno, CA 94066
